mapper.select: SELECT id, space_number AS spaceNumber, parking_id AS parkingId, name, location, floor, status, type, category, state, hourly_rate AS hourlyRate, daily_rate AS dailyRate, description, image_url AS imageUrl, is_available AS isAvailable, is_disabled AS isDisabled, version, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM parking_space WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, space_number AS spaceNumber, parking_id AS parkingId, name, location, floor, status, type, category, state, hourly_rate AS hourlyRate, daily_rate AS dailyRate, description, image_url AS imageUrl, is_available AS isAvailable, is_disabled AS isDisabled, version, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM parking_space WHERE parking_id = #{parkingId} AND (state = 0 OR status = 'AVAILABLE' OR (status IS NULL AND state IS NULL)) AND (is_available = 1 OR is_available IS NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE parking_space SET status = 'RESERVED', state = 1, is_available = 0 WHERE id = #{spaceId} AND state = 0
UPDATE parking_space SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{spaceId}
UPDATE parking_space SET state = 0, status = 'AVAILABLE', is_available = 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{spaceId} AND (state = 1 OR state = 2)

UPDATE parking_space SET state = #{newState},
status = 'AVAILABLE' status = 'RESERVED' status = 'OCCUPIED' , updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND state = #{oldState}

UPDATE parking_space SET state = #{newState},
status = 'AVAILABLE' status = 'RESERVED' status = 'OCCUPIED' , version = version + 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND state = #{oldState} AND version = #{version}
